front.title: Requirements, Terminology and Framework for Exigent Communications

abstract.t: Various agencies need to provide information to the restricted groupof persons or even to the generic public before, during and afteremergency situations. While many aspects of such systems arespecific to national or local jurisdictions, emergencies span suchboundaries and notifications need to reach visitors from otherjurisdictions. This document summarizes requirements for protocolsto allow alerts to be conveyed to IP-based end points.
